content.raw: Never mind, I can't seem to be able to reproduce it again. I'll just point out that textured materials don't seem to be working well for meshes like the `Monkey Wrench` or the `DRC Practice: Orange Jersey Barrier`. They seem to change color instead of texture when applying `Gazebo/Bricks` for example, but it could be some issue with the texture mapping of the meshes or something like that.
content.html: Never mind, I can't seem to be able to reproduce it again. I'll just point out that textured materials don't seem to be working well for meshes like the Monkey Wrench or the DRC Practice: Orange Jersey Barrier. They seem to change color instead of texture when applying Gazebo/Bricks for example, but it could be some issue with the texture mapping of the meshes or something like that.
